question:
Consider the following statements about the Global Environment Facility (GEF):
  1. It was established on the eve of the 1992 Rio Earth Summit
  2. It has been entrusted as an entity of the financial mechanism under COP 21
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is correct. Global Environment Facility was established on the eve of the 1992 Rio Earth Summit. Second statement is correct. Global Environment Facility has been entrusted as an entity of the financial mechanism under COP21. Article 9 of the Paris convention states that the GEF is an institution serving this Agreement.
